com.github.lazoyoung.craftgames.api.module

Interface MobModule


  • public MobModule

    • Constructor Detail

      • MobModule

        public MobModule()

    • Method Detail

      • spawnMob

        @NotNull
java.util.List<org.bukkit.entity.Mob> spawnMob(@NotNull
                                                         java.lang.String type,
                                                         @NotNull
                                                         java.lang.String spawnTag)

        Spawn vanilla mobs.

        Parameters:
        type - Type of mobss to be spawned.
        spawnTag - The name of coordinate tag which designates their spawnpoint.
        Throws:
        FaultyConfiguration - is thrown if spawnTag is not a valid Spawnpoint Tag.
        IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if type doesn't indicate any type of Mob.
        RuntimeException - is thrown if the specified Mob is not spawn-able.
        MapNotFound - is thrown if world is not yet loaded.

      • spawnMob

        @NotNull
java.util.List<org.bukkit.entity.Mob> spawnMob(@NotNull
                                                         java.lang.String type,
                                                         @NotNull
                                                         org.bukkit.loot.LootTable loot,
                                                         @NotNull
                                                         java.lang.String spawnTag)

        Spawn vanilla mobs.

        Parameters:
        type - Type of mobss to be spawned.
        loot - The LootTable which defines the items to drop upon death.Use ItemModule.getLootTable to get a loot table.
        spawnTag - The name of coordinate tag which designates their spawnpoint.
        Throws:
        FaultyConfiguration - is thrown if spawnTag is not a valid Spawnpoint Tag.
        IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if type doesn't indicate any type of Mob.
        RuntimeException - is thrown if the specified Mob is not spawn-able.
        MapNotFound - is thrown if world is not yet loaded.

      • spawnMythicMob

        @NotNull
java.util.List<org.bukkit.entity.Mob> spawnMythicMob(@NotNull
                                                               java.lang.String name,
                                                               int level,
                                                               @NotNull
                                                               java.lang.String spawnTag)

        Spawn MythicMobs.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the MythicMob(s) to be spawned.
        level - Initial level of the MythicMob(s).
        spawnTag - The name of coordinate tag which designates their spawnpoint.
        Throws:
        FaultyConfiguration - is thrown if spawnTag is not a valid Spawnpoint Tag.
        IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if name doesn't indicate any type of MythicMob.
        RuntimeException - is thrown if plugin fails to access MythicMobs API.
        MapNotFound - is thrown if world is not yet loaded.

      • spawnMythicMob

        @NotNull
java.util.List<org.bukkit.entity.Mob> spawnMythicMob(@NotNull
                                                               java.lang.String name,
                                                               int level,
                                                               @NotNull
                                                               org.bukkit.loot.LootTable loot,
                                                               @NotNull
                                                               java.lang.String spawnTag)

        Spawn MythicMobs.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the MythicMob(s) to be spawned.
        level - Initial level of the MythicMob(s).
        loot - The LootTable which defines the items to drop upon death.Use ItemModule.getLootTable to get a loot table.
        spawnTag - The name of coordinate tag which designates their spawnpoint.
        Throws:
        FaultyConfiguration - is thrown if spawnTag is not a valid Spawnpoint Tag.
        IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if name doesn't indicate any type of MythicMob.
        MapNotFound - is thrown if world is not yet loaded.

      • getNamespacedKey

        @NotNull
org.bukkit.NamespacedKey getNamespacedKey(@NotNull
                                                    org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity livingEntity)

        Returns the NamespacedKey assigned to this livingEntity.

        See wiki about NamespacedKey.

        See Also:
        NamespacedKey, livingEntity, See wiki about NamespacedKey
